title: shrI gaNEshAtparam
sahitya:
shrI gaNEshAtparam citta nahi rE rE shivAdi SaT trimshat tatva svarUpiNah 


anupallavi

  vAgAdir-panca kavyApAra rahita-hrdayAgAra samsthitad-yOgi rAjArccitAt


caraNam    mAtanga vadanAdu mA rudra darshitAd-bhUta bhautika vishva pUjita kaLEbarAc-
chvEtArka sumadharAt shvEtara vivarjitAt pItAmbarAvrtAd brahmAdyupAsitAd
(madhyamakAla)
bhUtAdi nuta padAmbhOjAcchivAtmajAcchITAmshu dhara parama shiva guruguhAgrajAt
